author: Carol Duhaime
comment: It doesn't work and no one can fix it for me. 😠

author: Mike Ryzak
comment: Nice job

author: Demi Ashmore
comment: Used to be a good app, now I literally can't load ANY coupons to my card, haven't been able to for days, keeps saying "experiencing technical difficulties", how long are the "technical difficulties" going to last???

author: A Elman
comment: Hooray! A new era in grocery shopping has begun! Registered with ClickList. Add items to the cart throughout the week. Submit and pay thru the app. Then just schedule and pickup outside the store. It even shows coupons I'd normally miss. LOVE!

author: Anastasia B
comment: Recently updated my app, now I can't load coupons onto my card!!!! I had to leave the grocery store because I can't afford to shop without coupons

When checking out app keeps telling me that I have switched stores which I haven't and everything in my cart is unavailable. Prices are still wrong and coupons and sale prices are not applied to products. This app is horrible and developers seem unable or unwilling to fix. Just about done with king soopers over this. For the same price Wal-Mart will deliver to my home instead of me having to puck up.

author: Holly Frazier
comment: Recently updated app and now I cannot load coupons to my card 😕 just keeps telling me app experiencing technical issues,  please fix

author: Adam Chapman
comment: I can't even order delivery. It won't let me switch from pick up to delivery

author: Misty Neal
comment: My downloaded coupons keep disappearing although they still show on my PC the app should still work. Please fix worked fine until a few weeks ago.

author: Samantha Petago
comment: The app just deleted all of my coupons and won't let me register add them. Even my Friday downloads are gone! This app needs to be fixed!

author: l y
comment: Does not work right w Android. Spent an hour on this app, get to the end to check out and got "Access Denied".  Useless.  Absolutely useless.
The app updated and lost all my coupons and free Friday downloads wont let me load any coupons that are going to expire and keeps saying technical difficulties needs to be fixed ASAP

author: Kathryn Day
comment: My app just updated about 15 min ago. I lost all the coupons i had downloaded! All my free    Friday downloads are gone!! Very upset 😡

author: Coral S
comment: Weekly ad is clunky and difficult to use. No sorting nor search options in app.

author: Mary Kannikal
comment: I can't seem to find departments on the Android app. Have to go to the full website for departments. Not friendly.

author: Rob Widman
comment: Great app for store coupons, also tells you which aisles items are located in

author: Bonnie Katzell
comment: Doesnt work for me even got a new card and it says my name dont exsist but i had this before...

author: Stephen Pack
comment: This app helps me keep track of my digital coupons, quickly see sale items, and my gas rewards -- same functionality as the website, but super mobile friendly

reply.author: The Kroger Co.
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Stephen, we greatly appreciate it!

author: David Culbertson
comment: I use this app to refill prescriptions, which no longer works aftet the latest update.

author: Sheila Cooper
comment: Excellent with prices, coupons, & search. Coupons not sorted by category. Thanks

author: Leslie DeCoster
comment: This new version stinks!!! Why did you take away the automatic upload button to get the list onto click list?!?! You've now made it so hard and time consuming to use click list, it's hardly a time savings now. Fix it soon!! You've already lost me doing several click list orders at this point alone.

author: Ty Nash
comment: Newest update takes away list view and the integration with clicklist isn't easy to use. Clicklist website was easy to use and find products while the card is difficult to fine items.
I can no longer bring up your weekly flier on the 13.1 upgrade!!  Seems like a dumb move,  just saying....

author: Christel
comment: Need to be able to add ad items to the clicklist.

author: Alyssa H
comment: Can't load my list to click list anymore. Frustrating going between two places to load coupons and check sales and great a list.  Please fix!

author: Arieth Aghanenu
comment: It's good

I loved this app until the recent update (october 2017).  It is now too time consuming and confusing having to constantly check and uncheck categories in the coupon section, and the new format takes longer to scroll thru with extra steps. I really hope they change it back to the simple user-friendly version. I stopped using it because it's too confusing. I'm sad because I used to love this app  :(

author: Brian Matthews
comment: Definitely prefer the previous way to add coupons. This newer version is 1.)confusing & 2.)laborious process to then sift thru "filtered" coupons. Just seems extremely inefficient.

author: Anita Gurule
comment: I can never load new coupons it always says I have too many coupons but it don't let me get rid of them I just stick with Safeway because Safeway let you go through the whole app

author: Julieta Bustos
comment: The last update doesn't allow to load the products selected on the app to the Clicklist. Now it is double the time it takes to have your Clicklist created. I don't know what they took away that feature on the app

author: Jeffrey Kuntzelman
comment: It works okay.  I can see if we have points to use for gas, and load coupons onto our loyalty card, but when it comes to accessing prescription Rx information, it either will crash, or it MIGHT let you in.  The website version isn't so buggy as the app.  So, there is need for much improvement.
It would be 5 stars if you could link your shopping list directly to clicklist.

author: Laurina Biggs
comment: Latest update I cannot transfer my shopping list to Clicklist, makes it hard now!

author: Adam Sergeant
comment: Bitchin
Helpful  app

author: Caitlyn Martinez
comment: Really annoyed. The app updated and now I can't seem to transfer my shopping list to click list, which I used to be able to do. Now I have to go re-enter everything into click list that I had already entered into my shopping list.
I don't like the new update.

author: Jessica Kilby
comment: Coupons are still being shown in the filtered results even though I have them unchecked.  Little annoying. Extra time being spent looking through them when I know I won't need them.

author: dirdy otter
comment: My favorite of ALL my apps automatically gathers the coupons I tend to forget about adds them then buy something I am unaware has coupon applies it!! What app does this?

author: J W
comment: Can't even get past creating an account or registering my rewards card.  So basically from the start it's a POS app.
